Interface ResourceAdapter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractResourceAdapter, BasicAbstractResourceAdapter, CoconutAdapter, DelegatingResourceAdapter, ExistingSSHResourceAdapter, Manager, PersonAdapter, Shadow, SimpleAdapter, SwallowAdapter, XMLRPCManager, XMLRPCShadow

      • getResource

        Resource getResource(Identifier identifier)
                     throws PTMException
        Get a resource by UUID
        Parameters:
        uuid -
        Returns:
        a resource, never null
        Throws:
        PTMException

      • addResource

        Resource addResource(Identifier parentId,
                   String name,
                   String type,
                   Map<String,Object> config,
                   Identifier owner)
                     throws PTMException
        Add a resource with given name, type and configuration
        Parameters:
        parentId - - the parentId of the Resource, usually the same as the adapters Id
        name - - a name for the resource. Can be null in which case the adapter must assign a name
        type - - type of the resource
        config - - configuration data
        Returns:
        the new resource. Never null
        Throws:
        PTMException
